author: Jacob Jenner
comment: This is a really good app, from what I've seen so far. The reason it gets 4 stars is because I think it should have a way of editing the room and teacher for a registered subject on a period-by-period basis. Right now I have to have a separate registered subject for each different room, or I have to have unregistered subjects. Neither option is particularly desirable. Other than that though this app is great and I still highly recommend it.
title: Definitely the best timetable application out there.

author: James Hatch
comment: Very handy with good UI on both Phone and Smartwatch. Would be very nice to have notifications at the start of each period and if the weeks changed automatically.  One issue I have at the moment is that I've set the timetable refresh time to '16:00 the day before', regardless, the timetable won't update until 00:00 on the day.

author: Lili Shaw
comment: Its great, does the basic things I expected it to do and has a nice theme/layout. Only thing I'd add is separate times for each day. Other than that, its pretty great for a free app!

author: Jamie Reason
comment: The timetable feature is the best one ive found and supports moving devices. however it can be quite tedious to set up and i havnt found a good use for the assignments mainly because i am not allowed to use my phone when they are set.
title: Really good for school timetable!

author: Shishir Paunikar
comment: Best timetable application till date. Would be great if you could add notifications for lectures and assignments. Also the banner ads are kind of annoying, would have preferred the earlier full screen ad in between.
title: Like it.

author: Asher Wood
comment: Mine different between days of the week, so they stop lining up
title: Doesn't work if not all your periods are the same time every day

author: Thomas McCready
comment: Does everything I wanted it to do. Not instead of getting out my timetable I can use my smartwatch to see my next lesson and the room number.
title: Amazing.

author: Matthew Lenahan
comment: Best timetable app I've found, the only thing missing is a full-sized timetable widget and lesson notifications.
title: Amazing

author: Giampaolo Frello
comment: Unfortunately this lack is a big showstopper for me. It's a pity as the design is very attractive
title: No Cloud backup and sync

author: Iftach Dafni
comment: Great app, but recommend to continue the development and "renew" it, for example, by changing the graphic on the sidebar to a modern one, adding option to change the theme and the icon color, and by fixing the bug which mark Sunday in pink also when it's setted to be the first in the week. Good start, can be better!

author: Lego9182
comment: Very useful. The Widget is also very nice as it allows me to easily see what I have to do and where I have to go. Thanks for this app, changed my life
title: Amazing

author: Hannah Nott
comment: Just what I needed. It's very helpful to have the widget on my home screen to see what my next lesson is and where it is. To improve the app, it would be nice for the weeks to change automatically
title: Great app

author: Mary Tricia Ann Pelipas
comment: Of all the timetables I've found, this is the best one! Quite efficient. Perfect for a student like me

author: TheOwen Smith
comment: It's a great app, but it would be nice if you could move it to the sd card. My phone had 2gb of storage
A range of different views could be added to the Android Wear application. Notifications could also be added. However, a very good timetable application overall.
title: Very Good

author: Omotunde Michael
comment: It's great and all. Just add a reminder for classes/lectures and a way to set up alarms/reminders. It's a really great app.
title: Good but...

author: Roopak Kumar
comment: It's Good but widget doesn't get updated 70% of time with day. So have to open the app

author: Steve Ziemer
comment: No way to select where to export to, or where to import from. Also, should have an option to use military time or a.m. and p.m.

author: Muhammad Fadhil
comment: Nice app. It would be better if it has larger widget like 4×3 or 4×4. thanks btw!

author: Facu Nievas
comment: Easy to use and configure. I have tested a lot of similar apps but this is the best of all.

author: Kavin Fan
comment: 简单实用，高中一直在用

author: Gaming International
comment: Echt sinnvoll, gut bedienbar und gutes Design. Die perfekte Mischung!

author: KIRAN SAWANT
comment: its good does the work its ment to do and its easy to use thats why i use it, all tjanks to the developer

author: Raphael Diaz
comment: Make the subjects have time of class and give notifications of what will be the class tomorrow or today
title: Needs.

comment: I tried a lot of different timetable said and this is the only one with all the features I need

author: Sandeep Thapliyal
comment: I can give it 4 if this app can notify about lessonas per the time.

author: Nur S.I. Chik
comment: Good but why the apps widget didnt refresh automatically

author: Equus. K. Zeimma
comment: This would be great app if it have Google Drive feature.

author: Manamohan Prusty
comment: Very much useful for academic applications.

author: Yahya Omar
comment: Great Organisation and only 3mb.
title: Great

author: Nathan Green
comment: Good timetable app!

author: Firoz Ahmed
comment: Simple, Easy, Useful

author: YASH GOHEL
comment: Besttt

author: Gabrielle Malonzo
comment: Very Helpful

author: Joshua Howe
comment: Needs notifications for lessons
title: Good App

author: Aiden Dryburgh
comment: Been using this app for ages and love having my timetable on my moto 360 but for the past couple of day the background of it has been brown and not white. Please fix this I think it looks terrible now! Can't find a way to change it anywhere
title: Brown background??

author: Alexander Gries
comment: It does what it's supposed to quite nicely, however the ads are obnoxious and interrupt the workflow quite a bit when all I want to do is finish filling in the timetable. I would much prefer reducing it to banners only instead of popups. The Android Wear support is as a concept very helpful, but what I'm missing the most is the ability to scroll back and forth between days instead of having just the current day on screen.
title: Neat little helper, Android Wear support execution lacking

author: Ohad Nargassi
comment: The app is awesome and beautiful. The only thing that bothers me is that Sunday is in red color, and that I can change the date format to dd/mm/yy in assignments.
title: Awesome

author: Daniela Okafor
comment: Needs these features: ◼ Ability sync across multiple devices ◼ Set different time duration for each day ◼ Set which days of the week to include. Eg. Mon, Wed, Fri only.
title: Missing lots of features

author: Oxygen Genesis
comment: Needs to have a more compact view for phones. Would like it better if the vertical width for each period adjust accordingly to its length.
title: Material design is neat but...
